H0.text: Michael, John, Steven and Susan are the children of which former US President. Jimmy Carter

H1.text: Michael, John, Steven and Susan are the children of which former US President. Ronald Reagan

H2.text: Michael, John, Steven and Susan are the children of which former US President. George H.W. Bush

H3.text: Michael, John, Steven and Susan are the children of which former US President. Gerald fod

A4.text: The couple had four children: Michael Gerald, born in 1950; John Gardner (known as Jack), born in 1952; Steven Meigs, born in 1956; and Susan Elizabeth, born in 1957.

A5.text: After living with her parents for two and a half years, on February 1, 1917, Gardner married Gerald Rudolff Ford, a salesman in a family-owned paint and varnish company.
